alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Hutchinson; Moore; Oldham; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 7:47PM CDT until June 09 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OLDHAM...WEST CENTRAL HUTCHINSON...NORTHWESTERN POTTER...MOORE AND SOUTHEASTERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 745 PM CDT, automated weather equipment 3 miles southeast of Dumas reported a 70 mph wind gust. Severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Sunray to 3 miles southwest of Four Way to 11 miles west of Boys Ranch, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dumas, Channing, Boys Ranch, Masterson and Four Way. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
